title: Registration Confirmation Email
description: Sends confirmation email when a user registers for an opportunity

config.subject: Registration Confirmed: {{trigger.data.entry.opportunity_title}}
config.body:
Registration Confirmed!

Hi {{trigger.data.entry.participant_name}},

You are registered for: {{trigger.data.entry.opportunity_title}}

Date: {{trigger.data.entry.opportunity_date}}

Time: {{trigger.data.entry.opportunity_time}}

Location: {{trigger.data.entry.opportunity_location}}

Registration ID: {{trigger.data.entry.registration_id}}

Thank you!
